comments.body: I'm kind of confused about where this type is used. `queueMiddleware` seems to be the only other thing exported from this library and `AsyncQueueAction` doesn't appear in its signature.

Its the type of Action that the `redux-async-queue` middleware is looking for. 
See example usage in the description.

Additionally have a look at the handling of the Action in the middleware [here](https://github.com/zackargyle/redux-async-queue/blob/e6d9a46941603b25c7c88d276e29579306714e2a/src/index.js#L34)
